text: madeena ke vaasiyon tatha unake aas-paas ke dehaatiyon ke lie uchit nahin tha ki allaah ke rasool se peechhe rah jaayen aur apane praanon ko aapake praan se priy samajhen. ye isalie ki unhen allaah kee raah mein koee pyaas aur thakaan tatha bhook nahin pahunchatee hai aur na ve kisee aise sthaan ko rondate hain, jo kaafiron ko apriy ho ya kisee shatru se vah koee saphalata praapt nahin karate hain, parantu unake lie ek satkarm likh diya jaata hai. vaastav mein, allaah satkarmiyon ka phal vyarth nahin karata
